biography: I am a Software Developer at Microsoft and develop backend services for Azure DNS. I received my Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from Stony Brook University, New York in May of 2019

workExperiences.title: Software Developer
tasks: Develop new Azure DNS features and deploy changes to Production servers in hundreds of servers accross 25 global regions
Automated validation of production builds using: Functional Testing, Stress testing and Automated Azure Resource creation
Mitigate and resolve external customer concerns with Azure DNS SLA

workExperiences.title: Software Development Engineer
tasks: Create serverless orchestrator for replacement orders and notifications.
Create, configure and deploy service with continuous integration to onboard with the service of a partner team
Develop service to inform customers of healthcare payment options in Java to create consistency in information displayed on the retail site and AB tested to ensure positive customer experience

workExperiences.title: High Performance Computing Engineer
tasks: Implemented unit tests to automate software environment maintenance of over 100 open source and enterprise applications in a parallel file system on CentOS Linux
Convert code to run in parallel using multiple nodes and cores
Resolved hundreds of Customer Service tickets by troubleshooting and debugging system issues

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
courses: Coursework: Software Development, Cloud Computing, Databases, Programming Languages, Algorithms, Machine Learning, Networking, System Fundamentals, Data Structures

projects.title: Stack Overflow Clone
tasks: Architected a system to sustain load of 1000 current users with 99% of requests handled in under 500ms

projects.title: Comic Website
tasks: Developed the frontend of a website to create, upload and consume online comics.

projects.title: Synchronized To-do List
tasks: Online to-do list accessible across mobile and web clients, allowing users to retrieve and update their list globally.

projects.title: Game Win Predictor
tasks: Implemented Machine Learning Models to predict wins from character selection and game mode with 60% Accuracy.
